other_tests.procedure_name: Ultrasound of the Liver or Gallbladder
other_tests.findings: Liver normal in echotexture; multiple anechoic cysts with through-transmission; several echogenic lesions (up to 1.4 cm) within the right lobe compatible with hemangiomas; common bile duct normal at 7 mm; gallbladder not distended but contains stones and sludge; no wall thickening or pericholecystic fluid; stone in cystic duct with layering debris.
